name: Bengo
overview: An exciting program for the un expanded Vic 20, which combines fast moving strategy and reflex skills You must control Bengo the Super Eskimo against the dreadful snow Yer Half band and half witted the Yet can smell a good Eskimo lunch the only protection) Bengo has is to hurl huge blocks of ice across the frozen waste at the Yeti. Don't get distracted or you'll be personally responsible for the demise of an Eskimo.
